markdownRemark.html:
I heard about the rumours how people who loved reading so much used to read books on the tiny little mp3. I am not that insane (for the sake of my eyes), but it’s definitely needed to read pdf files on mobile.

Sadly my android chrome doesn’t support this. I tried to get around with it using google drive for pdf previewing like this: https://docs.google.com/viewerng/viewer?url=yoururlonserver, that was OK, but the connection tends to be slow, and I’d prefer hosting things myself. Better find another way around.

So here it is: pdf.js by mozilla, this totally solved my problem. And I also found : a descendant project using react. I am currently working on making the demos, you should also give it a shot!

frontmatter.title: Serve pdf on mobile
frontmatter.description: It's really annoying that I cannot view pdf on my mobile due to browser compatibility problems, finally found a way to solve this.
